column3: ['"Alexa, Open Capital One"', '"Alexa, ask Capital One what\'s my account balance?"', '"Alexa, ask Capital One to make a credit card payment."']
column4: Ask Capital One about your credit card, checking, savings, auto and home loan accounts. Then try out our new feature, "How much did I spend?" to get quick answers on how much and where you are spending. Once you’ve enabled the skill, say “Alexa ask Capital One…”For your credit card:· “How much did I spend at Target last month?” · “How much did I spend at Starbucks last weekend?”· “What’s my current credit card balance?”· “When is my credit card bill due?”· “To pay my credit card bill.”For your bank accounts:· “What’s my checking account balance?”· “What are my recent transactions?”For your auto loan:· “What’s my car loan principal balance?” · “What's my payoff quote?”· “When is my car loan due?”· “To pay my car loan bill.” For your home loan:· “What's the principal balance on my mortgage?”· “When is my next mortgage payment due?”· “How much is my next mortgage payment?”To get started, sign in with your Capital One username and password (which we keep completely private). You can also create a personal key for extra security.  We're always learning and building new features, but we can't do that well without your feedback. If you have comments, please share them with us at www.CapitalOne.com/Alexa.

column3: ['"Alexa Ask Why Remax"', '"Why Join Remax"', '"Why Should I Join Remax"']
column4: This simple Alexa skill was architected to give a few reasons why you should consider joining RE/MAX, one of the most powerful real estate brands in the world. Simply connect the skill to your Amazon Alexa or Echo and ask, "Alexa, ask why RE/MAX?" It's that easy.

column3: ['"Alexa, ask Why Nab for the balance of Groceries"', '"Alexa, tell Why Nab to record a new transaction for 9 dollars"', '"Alexa, launch Why Nab"']
column4: Have Alexa help you gain total control of your money! The YNAB Alexa Skill makes checking a category balance or recording new spending a breeze!Never heard of YNAB? (Alexa pronounces it "Why Nab" and you should too.) It stands for You Need A Budget. It’s a powerful methodology coupled with award-winning software on the web, mobile, and now this companion Alexa Skill.This is a companion skill for YNAB. It requires that you first set things up with YNAB at YouNeedABudget.com. Once you have have a YNAB account, have enabled the skill and linked your YNAB account, you are ready to budget like a pro.To check a category balance:· “Alexa, ask Why Nab What’s the balance of Transportation?”· “Alexa, ask Why Nab for the balance of Eating Out”· “Alexa, ask Why Nab are we able to spend any money on Gifts?”· “Alexa, ask Why Nab how much cash do we have available to spend in our Gas category?”To record new spending:· “Alexa, tell Why Nab to record a new transaction.”· “Alexa, tell Why Nab to log 25 dollars and 64 cents in Eating Out from Checking.”· “Alexa, tell Why Nab I just spent 9 dollars and 32 cents.”· “Alexa, tell Why Nab I just received 10 bucks.”· “Alexa, tell Why Nab I received 5 dollars yesterday.”At any time you can say:· "I'm done"· "Help"· "Start over"· "Quit"To get started, we'll ask you to securely sign in with your YNAB email and password and select a budget for Alexa to access. You can revoke this access at any time from the "My Account" page.Disclaimer: This skill may not be suitable for all ages so parental discretion is advised.

column3: ['"Alexa, ask Coin Watch what is the price of bitcoin?"', '"Alexa, ask Coin Watch to give me a coin report."', '"Alexa,  ask Coin Watch what are valid coins?"']
column4: Coin Watch gives the current USD price of the top cryptocurrencies using cryptocompare. You can ask for the price of a specific cryptocurrency is. For example "What is the price of Bitcoin?" Or you can get a report of the more popular cryptocurrencies by saying "Give me a coin report."If you forget the supported coins listed above, you can ask "What are valid coins?"The following cryptocurrencies are supported now: Ethereum, Ethereum classic, Bitcoin, LiteCoin, Ripple, ByteCoin, Monero, DogeCoin, Dash, Stellar Lumens, Augur, Golem, Steem, MaidSafeCoin, and GameCredits

Now, he runs VaynerMedia–one of the world’s hottest social media-first digital agencies. Skill Details: All you need for set up is your Q4 Desktop credentials and an existing Q4 product subscription. If you're new to Q4, please contact sales@q4inc.com for assistance.  Here are some examples of what you can do with Alexa: Analytics: Alexa, ask Q4 about my recent web analytics.Stock Information: Alexa, ask Q4 , how my stock is performing.Activity: Alexa, ask Q4 to log a meeting.NLP: Alexa, ask Q4 how the marketing is performing today.  About Q4 Inc.:  Q4 is a global leader in cloud-based investor relations and capital market solutions. Our full suite of IR products including websites, webcasting, CRM and workflow, and intelligence solutions arm our customers with the insights and tools they need to better understand the capital markets, engage with their investors, and experience a seamless workflow. Visit www.q4inc.com to learn more.

column3: ['"Alexa, open Insurance Advisor"', '"Alexa, ask Insurance Advisor what does liability mean?"', '"Alexa, ask Insurance Advisor to help me find an insurance agent"']
column4: Confused by insurance? Insurance Advisor by Safeco is here to help! Alexa can answer questions you may have like, “What is umbrella insurance?” as well as assist in finding a quote by connecting you with a top-rated Safeco agency in your area. Think of it as your personal insurance concierge!So, how does it work? It’s simple. Start by saying, “Alexa, open Insurance Advisor.” Easy, right? Next ask Alexa to define a term from our glossary or find a local insurance agent and she’ll take care of the rest. Check out some examples of ways you can talk to Alexa below:• Alexa, ask Insurance Advisor what does liability mean?• Alexa, ask Insurance Advisor to help me find an insurance agent• Alexa, tell Insurance Advisor I have an insurance question.Insurance Advisor will make you an insurance whiz in no time at all! It’s yet another way that Safeco Insurance keeps its promise in making insurance easy for you. Since 1923, we’ve been protecting individuals and families with personal insurance for home, auto, boat and other valued possessions. We pride ourselves in connecting you with local independent agents who offer ease, choice, advice and above all—are there for you.

column1: by Help Me Buy My New Home LLC
column3: ['"Alexa, open Help Me Buy My New Home"', '"Give me homes with between three and four bedrooms"', '"Show me M. L. S. number 758850"']
column4: Search listings in the Northwest Florida area currently for sale. No sign-up required -- just add our skill and say open Help Me Buy My New Home. You can set as broad or narrow of a search that you would like. Ask for results after just one search term and see what all is on the market for sale or add another search term when asked. If you would like to add another property characteristic, you can ask for another search term to be added. Want to look at just three bedrooms? Say it, don't click it. Want to locate listings in a certain city or on a particular street? Say it, don't click it. What you're looking for can be found by property address or M. L. S. numbers as well. Say it, don't click it. Help Me Buy My New Home, changing the way you search for real estate. Say it, don't click it.To perform a property characteristic search, say something like "search for homes with between three and four bedrooms." Once you tell Alexa your first property characteristic, she will tell you the number of properties for sale that match that characteristic, and then ask if you want to add another characteristic or hear the list of properties matching your search. You can keep adding property characteristics, one at a time, until you are satisfied with your search. Once you are ready to hear your search results, Alexa will read a short description of each property; you can check the Alexa app for more details on each listing. For best results, do not try to mix property characteristics in a single statement. Currently, the skill supports the following property characteristics:square footage: some examples are "give me properties with at least 1800 square feet" or "show me listings with between 1000 and 1200 square feet." Make sure to say the words "square feet."year built: some examples are "look for properties built after 2000" or "tell me about houses built before 1990." Currently the skill only supports actual year built, not age, so statements like "search for properties that are at least ten years old" will not work.price: some examples are "give me information about properties that cost between 200,000 and 300,000 dollars" or "give me info on homes that cost at most 1,000,000 dollars." Make sure to say the word "dollars." number of bedrooms: some examples are "look for properties with 3 bedrooms" or "give me listings with between 5 and 7 bedrooms." Make sure to say the word "bedrooms."number of bathrooms: some examples are "search for houses with more than 2.5 bathrooms" or "tell me about listings with between 3 and 4 bathrooms." Make sure to say the word "bathrooms."city: some examples are "give me properties in Destin" or "search for listings in Santa Rosa Beach." Most cities along the Emerald Coast of Florida are supported.property type: some examples are "show me mobile homes" or "tell me about condos" or "give me information on houses" or "search for commercial sales."You can change property characteristics without beginning a new search. For example, if you previously said "search for properties with at least 5 bedrooms" but Alexa found no properties, you can say "show me properties with at least 3 bedrooms" while leaving all other property characteristics the same. You can continue adding and changing parameters and hearing search results, or say "new search" to begin a new search.To perform an M. L. S. number or property address search, say something like "tell me about property address 5437 Griffith Mill" or "show me information on M.L.S. number 768746." If a property currently for sale matches that property address or M. L. S. number, Alexa will read a short description about that property and then exit the skill; you can check the Alexa app for more details on that listing. Follow along with the Alexa app on your mobile device to see what Alexa hears. Go to Settings, then History in the Alexa app.

John Reilly, a 45 year veteran real estate attorney and Doug Devitre, a visionary in real estate training delivery have assembled the most comprehensive on-demand real estate dictionary to empower real estate agents, homeowners, and suppliers to the transaction.

column3: ['"Alexa, ask My Gold Wallet how much is gold?"', '"Alexa, ask My Gold Wallet my balance."', '"Alexa, ask My Gold Wallet list my wallets."']
column4: Get the current value of your gold, silver, and platinum holdings. Your holdings can be divided into metal-specific 'wallets' however you want. For instance, you can create a gold wallet called 'Eagles' and a gold wallet called 'Maples'. Asking this skill to 'list my wallets' would then give you the values of your eagles and maples separately. Or, asking this skill 'my balance' would total them up for you.To change how your metal wallets are grouped, or to add/remove holdings, simply disable and re-enable this skill, and you'll be able to provide a new set of holdings.

In about 60 seconds, get an update on what matters and how it impacts your business.To get started, simply enable the skill and ask Alexa to “Open Gen Blue News.”

column3: ['"Alexa, open Coldwell Banker."', '"Alexa, ask Coldwell Banker what is the Home of the Week?"']
column4: Every week is a new adventure! From beach houses to mountain retreats, Coldwell Banker takes you inside some of the world’s most luxurious homes with a weekly audio tour. Tune in each week to be transported to a new magnificent property listed by Coldwell Banker Real Estate.To get started, simply ask to hear the Coldwell Banker Home of the Week and allow the skill to access your device address to receive information about your local Coldwell Banker office.Once you’ve enabled the skill, just ask Alexa to “Open Coldwell Banker.”
column14: Coldwell Banker Home of the Week

column3: ['"Alexa, ask Stock Trigger to notify me when Amazon reaches 3 percent higher"', '"quote Microsoft"', '"Alexa, ask Stock Trigger to add Boeing to my favorites"']
column4: Set price notifications on S&P 500 or Russell 1000 company stocks. You can set a trigger and get notified in realtime on your phone/email when your price thresholds are crossed. You can also get stock quotes, maintain your stock favorites and compare stocks against each other. Careful though, our stock quote minion is very opinionated and with a complex personal life. Last but not least, StockTrigger lets you do limited Access/SQL like queries. You can find stocks that changed by specific percentages within the S&P index during last week/month or year. Enjoy.- Tell Alexa to "Open Stock Trigger". You will get a list of available StockTrigger actions as a response.- Set a US phone number to receive notifications by saying to Alexa "Set Phone (Your 10 digit phone number)". StockTrigger sends a verification link via SMS to make sure we got your phone number right. - Then set a trigger by saying for example "trigger Walmart at 75.43" or "Set notification on Mattel at 5 percent higher". You are now set up to receive a notification as soon as those prices are crossed.- Get stock quotes in realtime by asking "Quote Microsoft" or "Quote General Motors".- Add Favorites: Say, "Add Microsoft to my favorites". Get the quotes for your favorites by saying, "Get my Favorites". - Compare Stocks: Say, "Compare Microsoft against Amazon" or "Compare American Airlines to United" - Query for price changes: Say, "Find stocks where prices dropped between 6 and 7 percent last week". Or "Find stocks where prices increased more than 6 percent last month"S&P 500 and Russell 1000 stocks are supported for now and a wider selection of stocks is in the works. Stay tuned at https://stocks.pricetrigger.com

column3: ['"Alexa open office policy"', '"how to make fair housing policy"', '"how to make social media policy"']
column4: What's in a real estate office policy? New agents or brokers can ask Alexa about specific parts in order to keep compliant with rules and regulations. Ask Alexa about office hours, personal assistants, smoking policy, advertising policy, social media, and sales meetings. It's all right here. Then it's to up to get clarification from your broker, state license laws, and/or attorney to take preventative action when conducting real estate in your market.

column3: ['"Alexa, ask My Crypto Wallet my balances"', '"Alexa, ask My Crypto Wallet list my wallets"', '"Alexa, ask My Crypto Wallet how much is bitcoin"']
column4: My Crytpo Wallet enables you to easily check the balances of Bitcoin and Ethereum addresses, as well as current exchange rates of both cryptocurrencies. Any number of public addresses can be tracked, including offline and hardware wallet 'watch' addresses.In addition to letting you know balances in Bitcoin or Eth, you are also given the USD (or other selected currency) equivalent, based on current exchange rates.You have the option of adding a 4 digit PIN that must be spoken before your balances are given.When enabling / linking the skill, you will want to have your public wallet addresses handy, so you can paste them in one at a time.The balance information is acquired from public blockchains, using only public addresses.

column3: ['"Alexa, ask unofficial google analytics, how many page views did I get last ..."', '"ask unofficial google analytics, set me up"', '"ask unofficial google analytics, how many page views did I get between 5th ..."']
column4: Account Requirements:- A Google Analytics account which is configured with your website/application. Visit https://analytics.google.com for further details. 1. Alexa, Ask unofficial google analytics to set me up- The skill will ask you to link your account with your google analytics account which can be done on the Alexa app, as soon as you say "set me up". 2. Once you have linked the account, please say "Ask unofficial google analytics, set me up" The skill will now ask you to choose which website/mobile app (inside google analytics) you want to link with.Start asking your questions related to page views. This skill does not allow you to query for all metrics in google analytics. You can only ask questions about page views to your website. (More metrics will be available like region, country, web browsers,.. in a later version)For example:ask unofficial google analytics, how many page views did I get todayask unofficial google analytics, how many page views did I get between 5th February and 10th Februaryask unofficial google analytics, how many page views did I get a week agoask unofficial google analytics, how many page views did I get since last yearask unofficial google analytics, how many page views did I get from last month-To change to a different view of your google analytics account, just say "Ask unofficial google analytics, set me up" or "Ask unofficial google analytics, initialize"-To stop a session at any time, just say "stop"There is a small video on how to use this skill in case you still can't make it work.https://youtu.be/GJNsjWM4J-w

Sophia has done her research by looking at trusted sources like the FDIC, CFPB Research, Consumer Reports, and other independent sources.

column3: ['"Alexa, ask Virginia Credit Union what is the routing number?"', '"Alexa, get the rate for a credit card from Virginia Credit Union."', '"Alexa, ask Virginia Credit Union when the Short Pump branch is open."']
column4: Ask Virginia Credit Union about products and services, rates, branch hours and more from your Amazon Echo, Fire, or Tap device. You can enable the skill by saying “Alexa, enable the Virginia Credit Union skill” or by enabling it in the skills section of the Alexa app. When you want information from Virginia Credit Union, just say, “Ask Virginia Credit Union …”General Information:  • “…what is the bank routing number?”  • “…to get the mailing address.”  • “…what’s the Member Services phone number?”  • “….when is Member Services open?” Branch Information:  • “…what is the address for the Genito branch?”  • “…when is the Tower branch open?”  • “…how long is the line for an appointment at Seminole Square?” Lending Information:  • “…what’s the rate for a car loan?”  • “…what’s the APR for a home equity line of credit?”  • “…to get the interest rate for a credit card.”Alexa skills get better faster with feedback from users. Please visit vacu.org/alexa to provide us with your suggestions.

It allows you to track your incomes/expenses, pay bills on time by using the highly-effective calendar functionality, set goals to achieve – Welto will give you advises what can be done and how you can achieve it quicker. Now you have ability to aggregate all finances in one place and you can easily track you capital.

column3: ['"Alexa, ask GTC what is ADD"', '"Alexa, ask GTC what does NAFTA mean"', '"Alexa, ask GTC what is a Foreign Trade Zone"']
column4: Navigating through endless Customs and International Trade terminology or acronyms can be a headache when all you want is to complete or understand the documentation in front of you. Ask Alexa for help by simply saying, "Alexa, ask GTC what is NAFTA", or, "Alexa, ask GTC what is drawback". If the term in not present, Alexa will save that and the term will be added shortly after. Continuous use of this skill will help grow the database, so ask Alexa for trade-related terms.

column3: ['"Alexa, open customer objections"', '"i keep hearing give me a discount and i will buy today"', '"tell me more"']
column4: No's are natural. We hear them everyday and in every form. How we respond will determine whether we are able to influence others or accept rejection as our fate. Tell Alexa the objection you hear and she will give you the best tested response to help you get what you want, but more importantly help the customer get what they want. Gerhard Gschwandtner, publisher of Selling Power and Doug Devitre, a visionary in training delivery techniques using the latest technology have partnered to bring you the most comprehensive set os sales objections and rebuttals to help sales executives, sales managers, and sales professionals handle objections as they experience them.

column3: ['"Alexa, ask Stock Quote to get quote for MSFT"', '"Get quote for EBAY"', '"What\'s the price of AMZN"']
column4: With Stock Quote you can have Alexa tell you the recent price of any stock listed on the NYSE. Quotes may be delayed due to market restrictions.

column3: ['"Alexa, ask my crypto what is the price of bitcoin?"', '"Alexa, ask my crypto for the current price of bitcoin?"', '"Alexa, ask my crypto for the price of bitcoin"']
column4: Are you tracking the volatile price of Bitcoin? Do you sometimes want to know what the price is but you don't have a browser or tracker app handy? What could be more convenient than asking Alexa the current price of bitcoin when the thought strikes you?There is nothing to setup or prepare. All you have to do is ask "What is the price of Bitcoin". The app polls multiple exchanges and always has an up to date and ready answer for the current exchange rate between US dollars and Bitcoin.It will also tell you how much the price has changed over the last 24 hours so you can keep track of which way Bitcoin is moving!

column3: ['"Alexa, ask digital coins about Bitcoin"', '"What is the price of ethereum"', '"What is the rate of dash"']
column4: This skill is an easy way to get the rate of cryptocurrencies like bitcoin and ethereum in US dollars.

column3: ['"Alexa, open accounts receivable factoring."', '"My invoice is for two hundred and seventy five dollars."', '"My factoring rate is three percent."']
column4: Using accounts receivable factoring, you are able to tell Alexa how much your invoice is for and what your factoring rate is. Alexa will then calculate the factoring fees for you and tell you how much you can expect to get funded for your invoices. You will need to now your factoring rate in order to use this skill. In general, DSA Factors offers factoring rates between 2-5%, to get a quote, please give DSA Factors a call at 773-248-9000. You can learn more about accounts receivable factoring by visiting DSAFactors.com
